name: Hitesh Baghel
title: Java Backend Developer
description: Backend Engineer skilled in building scalable and efficient applications using Java, Spring Boot, and MySQL. Focused on API development, database management, and solving complex problems with strong software engineering principles.

about.summary: Hello! I'm Hitesh Baghel, a backend-focused developer passionate about creating impactful digital solutions. My journey is driven by a desire to solve complex problems using Java, Spring Boot, and MySQL. With hands-on experience in API development and system integration from academic and personal projects, I have built a strong foundation in Object-Oriented Programming and Data Structures. I am enthusiastic about applying my technical expertise to real-world challenges and am committed to continuous learning and growth in the tech industry.

projects.title: SkillSyncAI – AI Powered Placement Preparation Platform
projects.description: Designed and implemented a full-stack platform with AI-driven mock interviews, quiz generation, ML-based placement prediction, leaderboard & analytics. Enhanced placement readiness for students.

projects.title: ByteWise - A Toolkit for Engineering Success
projects.description: Engineered a comprehensive academic toolkit with semester resources, Razorpay payments, certified course showcase, and admin dashboard with CRUD operations and analytics.

achievements: Google Cloud Arcade Facilitator Cohort 2 (2025) - Selected for facilitator program, mentoring peers in cloud-native application deployment.
ProjectExpo 4.0, MIT Ujjain (2025) - First Place Winner & Cash Prize for innovative project showcasing technical skills and problem-solving.
Codathon, MIT Ujjain – Recognized as Top Performer in competitive coding event demonstrating strong algorithmic thinking.
certifications: C++ & Java, Database & MySQL - AK Soft
